page.title: 10LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Maud is a good place to live because there are so many good things, even after school you can enjoy yourself. There are many different clubs that you can join.For the old people-the Evergreen Club and there is an annual Flower, fruit & vegetable Show.Young Wives and Aerobics for our mums if they want to stay slim.Our mums and dads belong to the PTA.There are Guides,Brownies, Cubs, Youth Club and a badminton club.You can join dancing & learn highland or tap.There are lots of places to play and a pleasure park with swings, slide, roundabout, two football pitches, a croquet club and bowling green.There is a social club and at christmas there is a party there for all the children.There is one other pub The Station Hotel.
